header.title: Angles and Curves (and the ONA): An Esoteric Analysis of Alchemical Transformation
header.category: Western Esotericism, Occultism, Satanism, Esoteric Philosophy

central_thesis: This text asserts that the Order of Nine Angles' (ONA) system, particularly its concepts of 'Nine Angles' and 'Dark Gods,' is primarily an alchemical framework for profound individual psychological transformation and perpetual change, rather than a literal, objective reality. It argues that the 'Angles' represent intersecting dimensions or alternate realities accessible via a 'Curved Path,' leading to either profound insight or madness, and that ONA's terminology serves as a symbolic, operative structure to facilitate this internal, dialectical process of engaging with the subconscious and the 'Acausal' dimension.

structure_content.summary: This section defines 'Demons' as archetypal projections of the subconscious that gain autonomous energetic existence. ABSU is presented as a 'Dark God' manifesting in the causal realm due to societal psychic refuse, nihilism, and a lack of originality, actively intruding upon causal beings when nihilistic aggression escalates.

The author distinguishes between genuine originality, which is linked to the Acausal, and pervasive societal 'absurdity,' seen as a dangerous distortion of originality. This distortion, often mistaken for uniqueness, stems from beings ill-prepared to channel acausal currents, leading to destructive, nihilistic mimesis and aggressive escalation within 'the Matrix,' particularly in immature individuals.

This chapter critiques the social construction of 'sanity' based on productiveness, arguing that extreme independent views are suppressed. It controversially presents the 'notorious serial killer' as a 'pinnacle of sane' within the social 'Artifice' due to their ability to excel at fulfilling raw instincts, implicitly comparing them to 'socially sanctioned Serial-Types.' The section also explores the ego's role in self-deception and the societal 'madness' of materialism and chronocentrism.

structure_content.chapter_title: [IV] On Angles and Curves (and the ONA)
structure_content.summary: This part introduces the ONA's concepts of 'Angles' and 'Curves' within the author's own theoretical framework. It posits an 'Acausal Dimension' intersecting our 'Causal' dimension, from which 'Life+' (life with an Acausal component) originates. The 'Helical progression' of Life+ is presented as a non-linear, intuitive concept, contrasting with linear time/space, and is linked to the Tarot's Fool's Journey. The 'Angles' are described as interdimensional gateways.

structure_content.chapter_title: [V] Angles and Curves (And the ONA) Part 2
structure_content.summary: This concluding section delves into the origins and meaning of the 'Nine Angles' within ONA tradition. 'THEM' argues that the number nine is primarily a symbolic, alchemical, and psychological construct for individual transformation, rather than a literal geometric or numerical truth. It highlights the ONA's core 'triplicate process' of thesis-antithesis-synthesis as the underlying formula for perpetual change and states that ONA's symbols are ultimately disposable tools for inner work.

key_concepts.definition: The 'Dark God,' an autonomous energetic entity arising from archetypal subconscious projections, now manifesting in the causal realm due to collective psychic refuse, nihilism, and lack of originality. Its intrusion is enabled by escalating nihilism and sadistic aggression.

An alternate, multi-dimensional realm intersecting the Causal dimension, acting as the source of 'Life+' energy. It behaves non-linearly, is responsible for synchronicity and paranormal phenomena, and cannot be quantitatively identified by modern physics.
Our perceived reality, characterized by linear time and three-dimensional space, where phenomena appear to progress sequentially. It is subject to linear laws and is contrasted with the Acausal.

The concept of life imbued with an Acausal component. It is the energy from the Acausal punching through into the Causal dimension via a 'Nexion,' described esoterically as 'helical' in nature, with a pre-set series of conditions guiding its progression.
The point of intersection where Acausal energy enters the Causal dimension, giving rise to 'Life+.' It is also considered a point of magical access to this potential.

Irrational dimensions that intersect a rational curve; pockets of strange time and space (or timelessness/spacelessness) that can be entered knowingly or unwittingly. They are vertices of alternate realities, experienced as either destructive, instructive, or transformative. In ONA, they are esoteric forces or states of consciousness.

The path of least resistance through the 'Angles,' representing an optimal transition and progression through the challenges of life and esoteric development. It is analogous to the helical progression of 'Life+' and the Fool's Journey.

ONA's symbolic framework, likely chosen for its resonant qualities and numerological/mythological connections (e.g., Enneagram, Yggdrasil, 666=18=9). 'THEM' argues it serves as an alchemical formula for transformation and a means to apprehend esoteric energies, rather than a literal geometric or numerical truth, ultimately discardable.

Archetypal energies or 'convenient abstractions' within the ONA system. They can be perceived as having actual existence or as psychological tools; their primary purpose is to facilitate alchemical transformation and are eventually discarded once their function is served.

The central process of self-development in ONA, involving internal 'shape-shifting' and a dialectical method (thesis-antithesis-synthesis). The ONA's system provides a framework for an individual to continually change, transcend, and master their inner and outer realities, ultimately altering their 'Life+' and Acausal charge.

A formative state that shapes individuals from birth, operating autonomously and in tandem with the Conscious. It is the source of archetypal projections ('Demons') and contains 'horrific formative nightmares.' Deliberate contact with it is risky but essential for awakening inner 'genius' and developing 'super-consciousness'.

A device used by ONA, described as a helix superimposed on a structure of Seven Spheres. It aids in bridging the gap between rational understanding and irrational intuition, facilitating passage through the Abyss and encountering the 'Nine Angles'.

The core process governing evolution and transformation within the ONA system, characterized by a thesis-antithesis-synthesis model. This process applies to internal psychological states, external actions, and the overall progression of the initiate.

practical_system.description: The practical system outlined is one of internal alchemical transformation, aiming to fundamentally alter an individual's 'Life+' and Acausal charge. It operates on a dialectical principle of thesis-antithesis-synthesis, encouraging constant change and the integration of opposites. The ONA's concepts of 'Nine Angles' and 'Dark Gods' serve as symbolic 'handholds' or 'abstractions' to facilitate this process, guiding the individual to confront the subconscious, explore alternate dimensions ('Angles'), and navigate an optimal 'Curved Path' through existence. The ultimate goal is to awaken the 'genius of the subconscious' and achieve a 'super-consciousness' beyond the confines of the ego and causal reality.
tools: Symbolism of the 'Nine Angles' and 'Dark Gods' (as 'abstractions' or 'vehicles')
The 'Tree of Wyrd' (a helix superimposed on Seven Spheres, bridging rational/irrational)
Mastery of the subconscious and ego ('listening to both voices')
rituals: Conscious acknowledgement and tapping into one's 'Acausal Charge'
Deliberate contact with the subconscious (risky, may cause psychosis/suicide)
ONA's 'grade ritual of internal adept' (a rite of synthesis)
Undertaking 'works of darkness in the real world' to go beyond 'good' and 'evil'

relevant_quotes.text: Demons, are viewed by THEM as energies that occur from the significant projection of human beings – they are not “creatures” operating beyond the human being on some higher hierarchal plane, rather they are the archetypal projections of the subconscious that have become autonomous energetic entities.

ABSU is the Dark God now manifesting in the causal via the synchronous flow of a concentrated number of Magian Currents – particularly the absence of vitality characteristic of the Nazarene and the stark lack of originality that has begun to pool in the causal as psychic refuse and disintegration.

The current of Absurdity is being mistaken for the current of Originality. Aspects of originality surface in the presencing of the Dark God “ABSU” because of its innate connexion with the Acausal; but while its causal manifestation, absurdity, could be said to be creating forms that are 'unique' it is in fact a dangerous distortion of originality leaking through into our world that is being experienced by a race of beings ill-prepared to channel the current authentically.

Sanity is to a large degree measured by social productiveness. The intensity of a selfish separation from the consensus causes a corresponding ratio of difficulty in disguising it from others. As an individual tries to force reality to bend to match their own view... If sanity is measured by social productiveness, then the notorious serial killer is the pinnacle of sane.

The pre-requisite for a theorem of Angles and Curves is that there are other dimensions that intersect the accepted four, many of which we simply cannot find ways to understand, observe or express particularly in language - requiring us to rework again, our understanding of what we are currently and confidently calling invisible co-ordinates hanging on an invisible grid.

THEM believe that in a superimposition of ONA tradition and THEM theory, traveling certain Angles can alter the nature of a Life+ and may either: lead one back far more enlightened than otherwise to the path of the original Curve: or by accessing the Acausal to allow the genius of the subconscious to be awakened and the traveler to implement a new curve, that is to say, fundamentally alter Life+ and its Acausal charge.

THEM believe ONA Satanism could care less for the use of Nine Angles than it could about creating a series of effects in an individual that lead that individual to always try to change themselves and those around them via a perpetual alchemy.

An operation of nine angles for perfection; three angles of thesis: three angles of antithesis: and three angles of synthesis. A triangle squared. Whatever you want to call it, the ONA's use of three is not accidental or intended – but a result of the nature of the formula of Change which they are conveying. This triplicate process of thesis-antithesis-synthesis is a formula for finding balance and perpetual change.

Simply put - Withdraw your projections; forget the specifics of the Sinister Tradition and see how ONA have crafted their tradition. It is a key to understanding why. When you begin to see things naturally and always, in terms of how they were created, what tools were used to craft them, and marvel at the intricacy of the idea behind the text (essence behind appearance); to know the signs that reveal a creations intentions which may very well be contrary outward appearance; you will begin to understand the why.

critical_analysis.relevance: This work offers a critical, deconstructionist analysis of the Order of Nine Angles (ONA) from an 'internal' perspective ('THEM'), reinterpreting its overtly mystical and often controversial doctrines (Nine Angles, Dark Gods) as a sophisticated framework for psychological and alchemical transformation. It challenges literalist interpretations common in occult discourse by emphasizing the subjective, operative nature of these concepts. This reframing is highly relevant to contemporary Western Esotericism, particularly currents like Chaos Magic and post-modern occultism, which focus on subjective reality, psychological projection, and practical results over dogmatic belief. By contextualizing ONA's system within broader esoteric principles of change and synthesis, the text provides a valuable lens for understanding how seemingly abstract or dangerous doctrines can function as tools for radical self-alteration.
critical_analysis.target_audience: Advanced practitioners and academic researchers in Western Esotericism, Occultism, and Philosophy, particularly those with a foundational understanding of the Order of Nine Angles (ONA) and its associated terminologies. It is intended for individuals interested in the meta-philosophy of magic, the psychological dimensions of occult practice, and the critical analysis of esoteric traditions, rather than beginners or those seeking an introductory overview.
